articles.content: Govt to evacuate Indian citizens from Afghanistan's Mazar-e-SharifThe government on Tuesday appealed to all Indian nationals living in and around Afghanistan's Mazar-e-Sharif to leave for India. The … [+161 chars]

articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 10 ― Four Malaysian firms and startups have made it to the inaugural business news publication Forbes Asia’s “100 to Watch” list released today. According to Forbes Asia, the list spotlights notable small companies and startups on the rise a…
